ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Knowledge NPC's
ygData.msgSnippet: Not stupid at all. I couldn t get the translocators to work until someone sitting nearby pointed out my chronic misspelling of a critical word. I believe in
ygData.messageBody:
Not stupid at all. I couldn't get the translocators to work until
someone sitting nearby pointed out my chronic misspelling of a
critical word.

I believe in this case i did it correctly. tried several times. will
probably try again later, if the info from the previous posts does
not provide a solution. from checking the list of quests, it may well
be that some were not suitable for my level. I will explore these
later.

Barto

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, alexander.jones@f... wrote:
> Just asking the stupid question here, but you did type "continue"
right?
>
> This is standard procedure to get more dialogue if the npc needs to
give you
> a long message. Quite a few of the quests wont work until you go
through the
> whole dialogue.
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@c...> [mailto:MLockridge01@c...]
> Sent: den 19 december 2002 20:23
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Plane of Knowledge NPC's
>
>
> I have been exploring the pok for my last two sessions. Had a bit
of
> a break between sessions due to having no power for most of a week.
> Quite a storm here in the Central Coast district of California.
>
> In talking with many NPC's I found them giving me about a paragraph
> of monologue, breaking at a point which indicates more to come.
> However, few have the "continue" command attached. Anyone know how
to
> get the whole monologue from these NPC's?
>
> I tried increasing the size of my dialogue box, but had no success.
> Now I did have two boxes open, side by side, and only tried adding
> length to the box in which the NPC's were talking. I may try a
wider,
> longer box next time. Anyone have any experience in pok with this
> problem?
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
